CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
B            	LIGHTER THAN AIR                 	LIGHTER THAN AIR           
D           	DELTA WING/SWING WING            	DELTA/SWING WING           
G            	ROTARY WING                      	ROTARY WING                
H            	MONPLANE-HIGH/PARASOL WING       	MONPLANE-HIGH/PARASO       
K            	KITE/SAILWING                    	KITE/SAILWING              
L            	MONPLANE-LOW WING                	MONPLANE-LOW WING          
M            	MONPLANE-MID WING                	MONPLANE-MID WING          
Q            	MULTI WING                       	ULTI WING                 
S            	STOL/VTOL/TILT/WING              	STOL/VTOL/TILT/WING       
99999        	INVALID WING CODE
